title: Protect yourself from Shaytan all night!
transcript:
As stated in the Hadith of Abu Hurairah the long 
Hadith where a thief came over three continuous   nights trying to steal some of the treasury of 
the Muslims and whenever he was caught by Abu   Hurairah he pleaded that he was poor and his 
children needed food and then last night he   said that I will teach you an Ayah if you recite 
it in the night Allah would protect you from all   devils and the prophet said he told you the truth 
and he's a liar and that was about Ayatul Kursi
